name: Fluid-Kha
overview: Fluid-Kha is a platform game. The player was shifted in time to the ancient Egypt. Crossing through the pyramid of Chephren the player has to find specific items and deliver them to the spirit of Kha. In return, he will receive immortality and the title of Pharaoh. The pyramid is inhabited by hostile creatures, such as spiders, scarabs or mummies and protected by numerous traps, such as falling drops, fire and others. Contact with them means instant death. Although Fluid-Kha features a colorful animated intro, the graphics in the game are black and white.
